body_html:
@ageron , there are some remaining problems.

See https://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tensorflow-pull-requests-cpu/3955/consoleFull

    class MatMulInfixOperatorTest(test.TestCase):
NameError: name 'test' is not defined

Please use test_util.TensorFlowTestCase instead. There are plenty of examples in other py test files.

For the Linux CPU test, you can run the tests locally by using

export TF_BUILD_CONTAINER_TYPE=CPU
export TF_BUILD_PYTHON_VERSION=PYTHON2
export TF_BUILD_IS_OPT=OPT
export TF_BUILD_IS_PIP=PIP
export TF_BUILD_APPEND_CI_DOCKER_EXTRA_PARAMS="-e TF_BUILD_FILTER_INSTALL_TESTS_BY_TAG=-manual"
tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_parameterized_build.sh

body:
@ageron , there are some remaining problems. 

See https://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tensorflow-pull-requests-cpu/3955/consoleFull

```
    class MatMulInfixOperatorTest(test.TestCase):
NameError: name 'test' is not defined
```

Please use test_util.TensorFlowTestCase instead. There are plenty of examples in other py test files.

For the Linux CPU test, you can run the tests locally by using

```
export TF_BUILD_CONTAINER_TYPE=CPU
export TF_BUILD_PYTHON_VERSION=PYTHON2
export TF_BUILD_IS_OPT=OPT
export TF_BUILD_IS_PIP=PIP
export TF_BUILD_APPEND_CI_DOCKER_EXTRA_PARAMS="-e TF_BUILD_FILTER_INSTALL_TESTS_BY_TAG=-manual"
tensorflow/tools/ci_build/ci_parameterized_build.sh
```
